name: Piplup
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: It lives along shores in northern countries. A skilled swimmer, it dives for over 10 minutes to hunt.

attacks.name: Water Sport
attacks.effect: If Piplup has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage plus more 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Wavelet
attacks.effect: If you have Buizel in play, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
